pragraph: I am a full stack developer with a passion for creating clean, functional, and user-friendly code. I see everyday as a new opportunity to learn something new. Whether it be a new technology or a new hobby in life, I have always enjoyed the challenge of learning something new and seeing where else in life I can apply this knowledge. When I am not at my computer, I can be found fishing, working out, or enjoying time with friends and family

education.description: I attended Ohio University's Russ College of Engineering and Technology where I obtained my Bachelor's of Science in Computer Science

skills: Over the course of my 6 years of coding, starting in college, I have used many different languages, frameworks, and softwares to help me code and create software. Skills I have aquired over the years have been listed below.
